name: Modules.Identity.KeychainItem
summary: Represents a keychain item to communicate with the native iOS Keychain and Android Keystore.

events.name: save
events.summary: Triggered when a new keychain item is saved (or an error occurred).

events.name: update
events.summary: Triggered when a new keychain item is updated (or an error occurred).

events.name: read
events.summary: Triggered when a new keychain item is read (or an error occurred).

events.name: reset
events.summary: Triggered when a new keychain item is reset (or an error occurred).

methods.name: fetchExistence
methods.summary: Asynchronously determines whether or not a value of the specified identifier exists in the keychain item.

parameters.name: result
parameters.summary: Use the event key exists of the callback to determine the existence of the keychain item.

methods.name: read
methods.summary: Reads an existing value to the native keychain.
methods.description: The read event is triggered when an item is fetched. If an error occurs, the error key informs you about the exact error.

methods.name: reset
methods.summary: Resets an existing value from the native keychain.
methods.description: The reset event is triggered when a new item is saved. If an error occurs, the error key informs you about the exact error.

methods.name: save
methods.summary: Saves a new value to the native keychain.
methods.description:
The save event is triggered when a new item is saved. If an error occurs, the error key informs you about the exact error.

On Android this will also overwrite any existing value.

parameters.name: value
parameters.summary: The value to be stored in the native keychain.

methods.name: update
methods.summary: Updates an existing value to the native keychain.
methods.description: The update event is triggered when an item is updated. If an error occurs, the error key informs you about the exact error.

parameters.name: value
parameters.summary: The value to be stored in the native keychain.
